    • Method Detail

      • getDistance

        public static double getDistance(double coorX1,
                                 double coorY1,
                                 double coorX2,
                                 double coorY2)
        To calculate the distance between two points (X1,Y1) and (X2,Y2)
        Parameters:
        coorX1 - coordinate X of Point 1
        coorY1 - coordinate Y of Point 1
        coorX2 - coordinate X of Point 2
        coorY2 - coordinate Y of Point 2
        Returns:
        the distance between Point 1 and Point 2

      • searchRide

        public static double[] searchRide(TrafficCondition traffic,
                                  double coorX,
                                  double coorY,
                                  Customer cust)
        Returns a vector with the prices of the different kind of rides for the ride
        Parameters:
        traffic - Traffic condition at the moment
        coorX - coordinate X where the customer wants to go
        coorY - coordinate Y where the customer wants to go
        cust - customer who asks for the ride
        Returns:
        vector with the prices for the ride (prices[0]=>UberPool, prices[1]=>UberX, prices[2]=>UberBlack, prices[3]=>UberVan)

      • searchDriver

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Driver> searchDriver(java.lang.String type,
                                                       Customer cust)
        Search a driver meeting the requirements to complete the ride
        Parameters:
        type - Type of ride (UberPool, UberX, UberBlack, UberVan)
        cust - customer who asks for the ride
        Returns:
        ArrayList with the drivers available ordered by distance

      • searchPoolDriver

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Driver> searchPoolDriver(java.lang.String type,
                                                           Customer cust,
                                                           double destCoorX,
                                                           double destCoorY,
                                                           int numPeople)
        Search a driver meeting the requirements to complete the ride
        Parameters:
        type - Type of ride (UberPool, UberX, UberBlack, UberVan)
        cust - customer who asks for the ride
        destCoorX - coordinate X where the customer wants to go
        destCoorY - coordinate Y where the customer wants to go
        numPeople - number of people who will be on the ride (for UberPool is max 2 people)
        Returns:
        ArrayList with the drivers available ordered by convenience

      • selectRide

        public static Ride selectRide(java.lang.String type,
                              Customer cust,
                              double coorX,
                              double coorY,
                              double price,
                              TrafficCondition traffic,
                              int numPeople)
        After getting the prices the customer chooses the ride that he prefers
        Parameters:
        type - Type of ride (UberPool, UberX, UberBlack, UberVan)
        cust - customer who asks for the ride
        coorX - coordinate X where the customer wants to go
        coorY - coordinate Y where the customer wants to go
        price - price of the chosen ride
        traffic - Traffic Condition at the moment of the ride
        numPeople - number of people that will do the ride
        Returns:
        ride that the client will complete

      • pickUpCustomer

        public void pickUpCustomer(Ride ride)
                    throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Process after the ride is confirmed and the rider search the customer
        Parameters:
        ride - Ride that the client will complete
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Exception during the execution if there is some problem

      • startRide

        public void startRide(Ride ride)
               throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Customer is already in the car and we want the ride to start
        Parameters:
        ride - Ride that the client will complete
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Exception during the execution if there is some problem

      • getBalance

        public void getBalance()
        Get the system balance with the total number of rides and the total amount of money spent in the App

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
